rowOne.title: How Pipeline Works
rowOne.body: <p class="p1"><font size="3">Currently, Pipeline is a free to use platform!</font></p> <p class="p1"><font size="3">Pipeline is an invite only system of trusted investors and investment opportunities, based on over 30 years of experience bringing people and deals together.</font></p> <p class="p1"><font size="3">When you join our exclusive group, you will be able to create a listing based on your investment goals.</font></p> <p class="p1"><font size="3">If you are looking for an investment opportunity, check the posted listings to find an exclusive deal to invest in.</font></p> <p class="p1"><font size="3">If you have an investment that you wish to post, simply create a listing that will catch clients attention.</font></p> <p class="p1"><font size="3">(When creating a listing please remember not to include any personal information)</font></p> <p class="p1"><font size="3">Once a listing is approved by an administrator, our exclusive group will see your posting and have the opportunity to invest in your listing.</font></p> <p class="p1"><font size="3">If 2 or more parties are interested in discussing a possible deal there is some simple paperwork to complete before clients are able to freely communicate.</font></p> <p class="p1"><font size="3">The BEST part, is that our clients pay $0 unless a deal is agreed to by both parties. If a deal is made then we simply collect a standard finders fee based on the value of the deal (Detailed in the contract)</font></p>

rowTwo.title: About Pipeline
rowTwo.body: <p class="p1"><font size="3">Pipeline is a private and secure project listing platform which allows its invite-only user base to post and catalogue the following:</font></p> <p class="p1"></p><ol><li><font size="3">Projects for sale, projects seeking financing and projects seeking joint venture partners<br></font></li><li><font size="3">To offer Financing to companies looking to expand, purchase assets or fund an acquisition, in the form of debt, equity, profit sharing, off-take agreements or a combination<br></font></li><li><font size="3">Opportunities to buy or sell publicly traded or publicly quoted entities on the TSX, TSXV, CSE or OTCQB.<br></font></li><li><font size="3">Offer services to assist with listed public companies in the US or Canada or a request for such services.<br></font></li></ol><p></p> <p class="p1"><font size="3">The Platform provides a forum for users to review projects and financing opportunities currently available by their peers and interact in an efficient manner to determine if they wish to proceed to the next level to close on a transaction. The main purpose of the platform is two-fold. Firstly, it's a time-saver for busy business execs (hence the mobile aspect), creating a place where colleagues and partners can quickly scan projects and opportunities of interest. Secondly, it's a resource for users looking for either a project in which to invest, or an opportunity where they might be able to connect a buyer and seller and earn a commission.</font></p>

credits.body: <h2 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-align: center;"><font face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff" size="7">Credits</font></h2><h4 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">Information Architect</font></h4><p class="p1" style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica; text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">Dennis Petke</font></p><h4 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica; text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">Davin Deol</font></p><h4 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">Server Administration</font></h4><p class="p1" style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica; text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">Davin Deol</font></p><p class="p1" style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica; text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">Nile Lucus</font></p><p class="p1" style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica; text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">Daniel Petke</font></p><h4 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">User Experience Designer</font></h4><p class="p1" style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica; text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">Dennis Petke</font></p><h4 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">Server Hosting</font></h4><p class="p1" style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica; text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">Nile Lucas - I.T. Systems Management @Automation Plus</font></p><p class="p1" style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica; text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">Godaddy.Com</font></p><h3 style="text-align: center; font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">Special Acknowledgment</font></h3><p class="p1" style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica; text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">BCIT New Media Design And Web Development Practicum Program</font></p><p class="p2" style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica; min-height: 14px; text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff"><br></font></p><p class="p1" style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica; text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">BCIT New Media Design And Web Development Students In Their Final Term Of Study Are Available To Work Five Days A Week In Your Organization For A Three Week Period. The Students Have Completed The Majority Of Their Classroom Requirements And Have Job Ready Skills To Make An Impact Within Your Organization And Are Eager To Sink Their Teeth Into Real Work. This Program Offers Two Practicum Opportunities In April And September.</font></p><p class="p2" style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica; min-height: 14px; text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff"><br></font></p><p class="p1" style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-stretch: normal; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: Helvetica; text-align: center;"><font size="4" face="Helvetica Neue" color="#ffffff">The Practicum Program Provides Students With Exposure To The New Media Industry And Gives Them Valuable Work Experience. At The Same Time, You Receive A Recently Trained Student To Work On Projects And Complete Various Tasks Within Your Organization. It Is A Perfect Way To Try Out A Potential New Entry-Level Employee With No Risk. A Win/Win For Both Parties.</font></p>

loggedOut.cookies: <h2>Cookie Policy for Pipeline</h2><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="2">This is the Cookie Policy for Pipeline, accessible from http://pipeline-listings.ca/</font></p><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="2"><br></font></p><h2 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="6">What Are Cookies</font></h2><p><font size="4"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue">As is common practice with almost all professional websites this site uses cookies, which are tiny files that are downloaded to your computer, to improve your experience. This page describes what information they gather, how we use it and why we sometimes need to store these cookies. We will also share how you can prevent these cookies from being stored however this may downgrade or 'break' certain elements of&nbsp;the sites functionality.</font><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue"><br></font><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue">For more general information on cookies see the Wikipedia article on HTTP Cookies.</font></font></p><p><font size="4"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue"><br></font></font></p><h2 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="6">How We Use Cookies</font></h2><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4">We use cookies for a variety of reasons detailed below.&nbsp;Unfortunately&nbsp;in most&nbsp;cases&nbsp;there are no industry standard options for disabling cookies without completely disabling the functionality and features they add to this site. It is recommended that you leave on all cookies if you are not sure whether you need them or not in case they are used to provide a service that you use.</font></p><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4"><br></font></p><h2 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="6">Disabling Cookies</font></h2><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4">You can prevent the setting of cookies by adjusting the settings on your browser (see your browser Help for how to do this). Be aware that disabling cookies will affect the functionality of this and many other websites that you visit. Disabling cookies will usually result in also disabling certain functionality and features of&nbsp;the this&nbsp;site. Therefore it is recommended that you do not disable cookies.</font></p><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4"><br></font></p><h2 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="6">The Cookies We Set</font></h2><p></p><ul style="font-size: 16.8px;"><li><span style="font-weight: 700; position: relative; margin: 0px auto; font-size: 1.2em;">Login related cookies</span></li></ul><p></p><blockquote style="padding: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 40px; border: none;"><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4">We use cookies when you are logged in so that we can remember this fact. This prevents you from having to log in every single time you visit a new page. These cookies are typically removed or cleared when you log out to ensure that you can only access restricted features and areas when logged in.</font></p><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4"><br></font></p></blockquote><p></p><ul style="font-size: 16.8px;"><li><span style="font-weight: 700; position: relative; margin: 0px auto; font-size: 1.2em; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;;">Forms related cookies</span></li></ul><p></p><blockquote style="padding: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 40px; border: none;"><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4">When you submit data to through a form such as those found on contact pages or comment forms cookies may be set to remember your user details for future correspondence.</font></p><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4"><br></font></p></blockquote><h2 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="6">Third Party Cookies</font></h2><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4">In some special&nbsp;cases&nbsp;we also use cookies provided by trusted third parties. The following section details which third party cookies you might encounter through this site.</font></p><p></p><ul style="font-size: 16.8px;"><li><font size="4">This site uses Google Analytics which is one of the most widespread and trusted analytics&nbsp;solution<span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;;">&nbsp;on the web for helping us to understand how you use the site and ways that we can improve your experience. These cookies may track things such as how long you spend on the site and the pages that you visit so we can continue to produce engaging content.</span></font></li></ul><p></p><blockquote style="padding: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 40px; border: none;"><p><font size="4">For more information on Google Analytics cookies, see the official Google Analytics page.</font></p></blockquote><blockquote style="padding: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 40px; border: none;"><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4"><br></font></p></blockquote><p></p><ul style="font-size: 16.8px;"><li><font size="4">From time to time we test new features and make subtle changes to the way that the site is delivered. When we are still testing new features these cookies may be used to ensure that you receive a consistent experience whilst on the site whilst ensuring we understand which optimisations our users appreciate the most.</font></li></ul><div style="font-size: 16.8px;"><br></div><p></p><h2 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="6">More Information</font></h2><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4">Hopefully&nbsp;that has clarified things for you and as was previously mentioned if there is something that you aren't sure whether you need or not it's usually safer to leave cookies enabled in case it does interact with one of the features you use on our site. This Cookies Policy was created with the help of the GDPR Cookies Policy Generator</font></p><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4"><br></font></p><p><font size="4"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue">However&nbsp;if you are still looking for more information then you can contact us through one of our preferred contact methods:</font></font></p><p><font size="4"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue">Email: daniel@pipeline-listings.com</font></font></p>
loggedOut.termsAndConditions: <h2 style=";">Terms and Conditions<br></h2><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="2">This is the Terms and Conditions for Pipeline, accessible from http://pipeline-listings.ca/</font></p><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="2"><br></font></p><h2 style="/* font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; *//* color: rgb(51, 51, 51); */"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="6">Introduction</font></h2><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4">The Terms and Conditions&nbsp;describe the rules you must follow in order to be active as a registered user of Pipeline. We advise that everyone read Terms and Conditions&nbsp;carefully before registering for our website. If you do not agree to these&nbsp;</font><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;; font-size: large;">Terms and Conditions you may not&nbsp;have access to the&nbsp;website&nbsp;as a&nbsp;registered user</span><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4">.</font><br></p><p><font size="4"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue"><br></font></font></p><h2 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="6">Listings</font></h2><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4">As the main feature for our website, listings are postings our users make in an attempt to form connections with other users. In an effort to make our listings exclusive to our website we disallow any user from disclosing listings' information. This includes the description, summary, owner's information, target goal and other information.</font></p><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4"><br></font></p><h2 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="6">Privacy</font></h2><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4">Before you officially form connections with other users, you cannot disclose your personal information. This includes your name and contact information. The reason we enforce this is to prevent users from establishing deals behind the scenes without disclosing them with the website.</font></p><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4"><br></font></p><h2 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="6">Intellectual Property</font></h2><div style=""><p style=""><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4">We at Pipeline do not condone plagiarism and in order to prevent it, any&nbsp;listing you make can never be a copy of someone else's listing.&nbsp;If it is discovered that a user has posted another user's listing and attempted to pass it off as their own, their account is subjected to suspension and possibly termination.</font></p></div><blockquote style="padding: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 40px; border: none;"><p><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="4"><br></font></p></blockquote><h2 style="font-family: &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><font color="#000000" face="Helvetica Neue" size="6">Terms</font></h2><p><font size="3"><span style="font-weight: 700; position: relative; margin: 0px auto; font-size: 1.2em;">You</span>: Anyone who accesses our website as a registered user and anyone acting on behalf of the user.</font></p>
